reviewText: This was the WORST dubbed season of the series ever, I would stick to just downloading the originals or finding imports of them on eBay if you can.  The way this season was butchered, the way these characters were voiced, The replacement music added, the stuff changed in this dub, insulting.  Jason Griffith is the WORST voice actor I have ever heard, have you actually listened to him in Sonic Riders?  The way he made Sonic say "Yeah" compared to the way Ryan said it in "Sonic Advance 3" and other games is insulting to the character.  I was originally looking forward to this but then when I saw how much it was altered and edited, I just could not watch anymoreDon't buy this DVD, you would be better off just recording the episodes off of TV for yourself.
summary: A series that was great in Japanese but these season has been terribly butchered
Title: Sonic X - Complete Fifth Season

reviewText: I really like this show alot, But are there plans to release it"UNCUT"? I would like to collect some of the Episodes in certainVolumes. I have some fun doing that.
summary: Will this show be released UNCUT?
Title: Sonic X - Complete Fifth Season

reviewText: I bought this DVD back when it was released in October 2006, and I like the fact that it has 2 discs. It has more episodes than the standard volumes. The third season in my opinion was the best of Sonic X. By the way, if you buy this the cover does NOT look like the one Amazon is displaying!!! It only has Sonic on it in that pose on there, and there's a nighttime background with a spaceship behind him.
summary: It's a cool DVD, not worth the prices being charged on here though
Title: Sonic X - Complete Fifth Season

reviewText: Sonic X may not be one of 4Kids WORST dubbed animes, but it ranks fairly high
Title: Sonic X - Complete Fifth Season

reviewText: EVERONE WHO DOESN'T WATCH THE SERIES ON 4 KIDS THOUGHT VOLUME 10 WAS THE END BUT,HERE COMES SEASON 3! PLEASE WELCOME A NEW CHARACTER TO THE MAIN GANG COSMO!,SHADOW RETURNING!,A NEW ENEMY!,THE CHAOTIX GETTING A BIGGER ROLE!,AND MUCH MORE.JOIN THE GANG AS COSMO JOINS THE PLOT,CHRIS COMES TO MOBIUS,AND AN ULTIMATE WAR AGAINST THE EVIL METEREX. IT'S EVERY PLANET FOR ITSELF. JOIN SONIC AND THE GANG IN A WHOLE NEW PLOT TO THE SERIES.PLEASE NOT THAT THIS REALLY IS THE FIRST 13 EPISODES OF THE 3rd SEASON. THERE ISN'T EVEN A FITH SEASON AND THERE PROBABLY WON'T BE A FOURTH ONE BECAUSE THE SHOW WAS NEVER RENEWED. ALSO IT WAS TAKEN OF THE AIR RIGHT AFTER THE FIRST HALF OF THIS SEASON HAD REPEATED.
Title: Sonic X - Complete Fifth Season
